#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
//#include<conio.h>
#include<cstring>
#define N 1000001
#include<algorithm>
#define LL long long
#define K 1000000001
#define IREP(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<=b;++i)
#define DREP(i,a,b) for(i=a;i>=b;--i)
#define scan(x) scanf("%d",&x);

int den[60];
bool cmp(int a,int b)
{return a>b;
     
}


void canf(int &a)
{char ch;a=0;int flag=0;
while((ch=getchar_unlocked())<'0');
while(ch>='.')
{if(ch>='0')
{a=a*10+ch-'0';}
else if(ch=='.')flag=1;
  ch=getchar_unlocked();            
}     
if(!flag)a*=100;
}


int main()
{int t,n,m,s,i,j,p,q;double sum,r;
scan(t);
IREP(i,1,t)
{
scan(n);scan(m);
IREP(j,0,n-1){canf(q);den[j]=q;
//printf("%d\n",den[j]);
}
printf("Case %d:\n",i);
std::sort(den,den+n,cmp);
IREP(j,1,m)
{
canf(q);
printf("Scenario %d:\n",j);
int k=0;
while(q!=0)
{
p=q/den[k];

//printf("***%d %d %d %d\n",p,q,den[k],q/den[k]);
if(p){
q=q%den[k];
if(den[k]>=100)
printf("%d %d\n",den[k]/100,p);
else
printf("%0.2lf %d\n",(double)den[k]/100,p);
//q=r;
}
k++;
//getch();
             
}

           

}
           
           
           
}
return 0;    
    
    
}
